sentences.en: An uncanny light seemed to be coming from the castle.
sentences.cn: 一道神秘的光像是从古堡中射出的.

sentences.en: He seemed to have an instinct about the cards. It was uncanny.
sentences.cn: 他好象对牌有一种本能似的, 简直神了.

sentences.en: He was very frail, and his eyes were really uncanny.
sentences.cn: 他孱弱异常, 眼神真可以说是神秘莫测.

sentences.en: His powers of observation were uncanny.
sentences.cn: 他的观察能力非常惊人.

sentences.en: I had an uncanny feeling I was being watched.
sentences.cn: 我有种被人监视的奇怪感觉。

sentences.en: I had this uncanny feeling that Alice was warning me.
sentences.cn: 我有一种奇怪的感觉：艾丽斯是在警告我。

sentences.en: No matter how much we like honey, or how much we have read about the uncanny sense of direction which bees posses, we have a horror of being stung.
sentences.cn: 不管我们有多么喜欢蜂蜜, 或者不管我们读过多少关于蜜蜂所具有的不可思议的方向感的书籍, 我们都怕被蜇.

sentences.en: Sadat had an uncanny psychological discernment.
sentences.cn: 萨达特有惊人的能力,能看透别人的心理.

sentences.en: She has an uncanny sense of what others feel.
sentences.cn: 她具有察觉他人心思的异常敏锐的感觉.

sentences.en: She impressed me as so uncanny and fateful.
sentences.cn: 她给我的印象是那样的神秘怪异,那样的未卜先知.

sentences.en: The hero, Danny, bears an uncanny resemblance to Kirk Douglas.
sentences.cn: 主人公丹尼与柯克·道格拉斯出奇地相像。

sentences.en: The scene and circumstances were so very uncanny.
sentences.cn: 当时的情景实在叫人害怕.

sentences.en: The similarity between the two is uncanny.
sentences.cn: 这两者之间有着不可思议的相似性。

sentences.en: This little pill targets cancer cells with uncanny precision.
sentences.cn: 这种小药丸能神奇地精确击中癌细胞.

sentences.en: Tony was unnerved by the uncanny familiarity of her face.
sentences.cn: 怪异的是，她看起来竟有些面熟，这让托尼心慌意乱。

words.tran_cn: 惊异地；神秘地；不寻常地；危险地

trans.tran_cn: 神秘的，可怕的，怪异的，危险的
trans.tran_en: very strange and difficult to explain
